sentence.text: What's Ron Marston like?
He's awful!
He telephoned me four times yesterday.
sentence.textCn: 他昨天给我打了4次电话。

sentence.text: And three times the day before yesterday.
He telephoned the office yesterday morning and yesterday afternoon.
sentence.textCn: 他昨天上午和下午地电话打到了我的办公室。

sentence.text: My boss answered the telephone.
What did your boss say to him?
sentence.textCn: 你老板是怎么对他说的？

sentence.text: He said, 'Pauline is typing letters.'
She can't speak to you now!
Then I arrived home at six o'clock yesterday evening.
sentence.textCn: 后来，我昨天6点钟回到家里。

sentence.text: He telephoned again.
But I didn't answer the phone!
Did he telephone again last night?
sentence.textCn: 他昨天晚上又打电话了吗？

sentence.text: Yes, he did.
He telephoned at nine o'clock.
sentence.textCn: 他在9点钟又打来了电话。

sentence.text: What did you say to him?
I said, 'This is Pauline's mother.'
Please don't telephone my daughter again!
sentence.textCn: 请不要再给我女儿打电话了！

sentence.text: Did he telephone again?
No, he didn't!
